#summary Release notes, including the upcoming release

Release Notes for My Tracks version 1.1.13
  * Improve string translations
  * Fix crashes when an error occurs during import
  * Fix crashes when an empty string is stored for the "Percentage".
  * Fix crashes when opening the "Sensor state" without pairing
    a bluetooth device.
  * Add support for Norwegian.
  * Fix border on Chart view.
  * Fix metric/imperial display on Chart view.
  * Fix speed/pace display on Chart view and Chart settings.
  * Improve Chart settings layout.
  * Fix total distance repeated twice in voice announcement.
  * Change the about page layout to single column.
